destinations.name: Ilam Tea Garden
destinations.description: Ilam Tea Garden is the tea history of Nepal and hence the oldest tea garden (161 years old now). Ilam began tea cultivation in 1863 AD when the Chinese government sent tea saplings to Prime Minister Jung Bahadur Rana. It covers 49.5 hectares of land near Ilam bazaar. The Ilam orthodox tea with aromatic flavor is one of the best teas in the world. The roasting of tea leaves in machines began in Nepal after the establishment of a tea factory in 15/8 in Ilam.

details.production: More than 60 million kilograms of tea exported to India, America, Australia, and Europe
details.significance: In 1985, Nepal's government declared five districts of eastern Nepal as tea zone. The climatic condition of all the districts except Jhapa being in terai, is perfectly suitable to produce orthodox Tea. In recent years, some Nepali tea producers have started producing organic tea similar to Darjeeling tea.
details.impact: It is the tea estate that has helped to extend the adjoining human settlement with local commercial markets and income generation until today linking both rural life and city life. It is a boon that the tea garden and Ilam Municipality always complement each other offering employment to the tea pluckers and factory workers and green gem of tea garden recreation and sightseeing to the visitors.

destinations.name: Mai Pokhari
destinations.description: Mai Pokhari is a beautiful lake surrounded by lush green forests and tea gardens. It is a popular pilgrimage site and a great place for nature lovers.

details.significance: It is one of the most important religious sites in eastern Nepal and is listed in the Ramsar Convention on Wetlands.

destinations.name: Kanyam Tea Garden
destinations.description: Kanyam Tea Garden is another beautiful tea garden in Ilam known for its scenic beauty and tea production.

details.significance: Known for its high-quality tea production and beautiful landscapes.

destinations.name: Chhintapu
destinations.description: A beautiful viewpoint offering panoramic views of the Himalayas and surrounding hills. Perfect for sunrise and sunset views.

destinations.name: Antudanda
destinations.description: A hill station offering breathtaking views of the Himalayas and surrounding valleys. Popular for trekking and nature walks.

destinations.name: Shree Antu
destinations.description: Famous for its sunrise views over Mount Kanchenjunga, Shree Antu is a must-visit destination for nature lovers and photographers.
